timeline.symptom: Shortness of breath, Palpitations, Chest pain

notes.discussion: Patient had a sudden onset of fever with cough which lasted for 5 days and got relieved on medication. It could have been Rheumatic fever.

timeline.symptom: Shortness of breath, Palpitations, Chest pain, Swelling of legs

notes.discussion: Patient's symptoms increased in intensity, with shortness of breath, palpitations, chest pain, and swelling of legs.

timeline.activity: Patient was admitted to the hospital
timeline.symptom: Shortness of breath, Palpitations, Chest pain, Swelling of legs
timeline.treatment: Tab. Diuretics, Tab. Budecort, Anti-Coagulants with warfarin orally

notes.physical_exam: Wheezing in right side, Coarse crepitations in right side, Pulse: Normal rate, Irregularly irregular rhythm
notes.investigations: CBP, RFT, LFT, ECG, Chest X ray, 2D ECHO
notes.lab_measurements: Microcytic hypochromic anemia with neutrophilia, Elevated blood urea, Elevated uric acid, Elevated Calcium, Elevated Phosphorus
notes.discussion: Patient was diagnosed with Left Heart Failure due to Mitral Stenosis.

timeline.diagnosis: Mitral Stenosis with Left Heart Failure

notes.investigations: Doppler study, Cardiac catheterisation, Transoesophageal echocardiography, TFT, Cardiac MRI, BNP levels
notes.discussion: Patient was diagnosed with Mitral Stenosis with Left Heart Failure, and treatment plan was made.
